snippet: Pfizer, which has been selling off units to concentrate on development of medicines, may be ready to sell the nutrition unit to Nestlé.
abstract: Pfizer, which has been selling off units to concentrate on development of medicines, may be ready to sell the nutrition unit to Nestlé.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Pfizer Nears Sale of Infant Nutrition Unit
